name: Magic Liquidizer Responsive Form
author: Elvin D.

sections.description:
A simple and lightweight WordPress plugin that converts HTML FORM to become responsive. It’s a must have wp plugin for Responsive Web Design (RWD). Forms can display odd on small devices or when dragging your browser to minimizing it for mobile screens test specifically when the forms contain input types such as text field, textarea field, select fields, checkbox, radio buttons, submit button, labels, etc. So this is your solution!

Magic Liquidizer Responsive Form plugin – is just one of many features of Magic Liquidizer for a complete Responsive Web Design solution such as images, texts, forms, forms, navigation menu, and other HTML elements.

Go and see the demo link below where Magic Liquidizer plugin is installed, minus anything else, just observe the Responsive Form function. See DEMO.

If you like this plugin, good ratings is much appreciated.

*Note: This plugin will only work if you have existing non-responsive form.

For more information kindly check InnoveDesigns.com Responsive Form article. and leave a message via our contact form for further concerns.
sections.installation:
Installation is very easy, download and upload via WordPress Plugin Section.

  1. After activation, go to Dashboard > Magic Liquidizer Lite > Form.

You’re done!
sections.faq:
Where to find Magic Liquidizer Responsive Form settings?

You can find via WordPress Dashboard > Magic Liquidizer Lite > Form.

How to get form Class or ID?

You can use Chrome Inspector or Firefox Firebug Extension to inspect element. But basically form value signifies that all <form> .. </form> will make responsive. Please watch this video tutorial on YouTube.

    • [Fixed] Uninstall Function in the Plugin Admin

1.0.4 – 08/29/2014

    • [Added] Magic Liquidizer Responsive Navigationbar Compatibility

1.0.3 – 08/27/2014

    • [Changed] id-* to ml-*
    • [Improved] JS
    • [Changed] CSS Class from clearfix to ml-clearfix
    • [Added] jQuery noConflict()

1.0.2 – 02/03/2014

    • [Improved] CSS
    • [Improved] JS

1.0.1

    • [Improved] JS

1.0.0 – 02/2/2014

  • Initial Released Date
